alert.note: Alert for Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 5:28PM EDT until July 26 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Geauga County in northeastern Ohio... Lake County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 528 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 30 miles northwest of Geneva-On-The-Lake to 7 miles north of Fairport Harbor to near Euclid, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Painesville, Willowick, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Mentor, Willoughby, Eastlake, Madison, Perry, Timberlake, Lakeline, Wickliffe, Willoughby Hills, Highland Heights, Mentor-On-The-Lake, Kirtland, Mayfield, Gates Mills, Montville and North Perry. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
